mapper.select: select row_num, uuid, uploadpath, filename, p_code, p_price,p_name,p_type,p_content, bno from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY p.p_code order by p.p_code) row_num, uuid, uploadpath, filename, p_a.p_code, p_price, p_name, p_type, p.p_content, board.bno from productattach p_a left outer join product p on p_a.p_code = p.p_code INNER JOIN productboard board on p.p_code = board.p_code where t_amount > 0 order by p_sale desc) where row_num = 1

select row_num, uuid, uploadpath, filename, p_code, p_price, p_name, p_type, p_content, bno from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY p.p_code order by p.p_code) row_num, uuid, uploadpath, filename, p_a.p_code, p_price, p_name, p_type, p.p_content, board.bno from productattach p_a left outer join product p on p_a.p_code = p.p_code INNER JOIN productboard board on p.p_code = board.p_code where t_amount > 0 and p_type LIKE '%'||#{p_type}||'%' order by p_sale desc) where row_num = 1

select row_num, uuid, uploadpath, filename, p_code, p_price, p_name, reg_date, p_content, bno from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY p.p_code order by p.p_code) row_num, uuid, uploadpath, filename, p_a.p_code, p_price, p_name, p.reg_date, p.p_content, board.bno from productattach p_a left outer join product p on p_a.p_code = p.p_code INNER JOIN productboard board on p.p_code = board.p_code order by reg_date desc) where row_num = 1
mapper.insert:
select max(p_code) from product
insert into ProductAttach(uuid,uploadpath,filename,p_code) values(#{uuid},#{uploadpath},#{filename},#{p_code})
mapper.select: select * from ProductAttach where uploadpath = to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy\mm\dd')
